× mismatched types
   ╭─[[PROJECT_ROOT]/src/lib.rs:4:11]
 3 │ /// ```
 4 │ unsafe fn foo() -> i32 {
   ·           ─┬─      ─┬─
   ·            │        ╰── expected `i32`, found `()`
   ·            ╰── implicitly returns `()` as its body has no tail or `return` expression
 5 │     1 + 1
   ╰────

[External Info] For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0308`.
